title: NGIP-3 : How many claimable / NPC?
body:
Number is arbitrary :
Take a randomiser within a range and choose this for max entropy.

Clean Numbers:
10
100
1000

(10000
deployed : https://kovan.etherscan.io/token/0xdbca83e0c066566488b7f58f34ccff203f28d4eb?a=1#readContract)


100000
1000000

Repeating Numbers:
11
111
111
1111
1111
3333
555555


Loot Binary:
01101100 01101111 01101111 01110100
 is the binary for "loot" 
as an homage we could allow each NPC to claim 
1,101,100,011,011,110,110,111,101,110,100 Crystals / NPC 
leading to 
 8,808,800,.088,088,880,880,888,808,880,800,000 total supply
or divide that number by 8000? 



NPC Binary:
a lower total supply and something even simpler:
11011100111000001100011 is binary for NPC
spelled out 
eleven sextillion eleven quintillion one hundred quadrillion one hundred eleven trillion one million one hundred thousand eleven/ 8000

is 
1376387500000000000 Crystals / NPC
spelled out 
one quintillion three hundred seventy-six quadrillion three hundred eighty-seven trillion five hundred billion
